snippet: Silence has become a luxury in New York that scant few can truly afford, and cultural, technological and economic changes  have added to the city’s din, creating not one culprit but many.
abstract: Silence has become a luxury in New York City that scant few can truly afford; cultural, technological and economic changes have added to the din everyone else must endure, creating not one culprit but many; some say  city has been reluctant to crack down on certain noise offenders, like construction companies, in recent years (Series: What?).
lead_paragraph: Silence has become a luxury in New York that scant few can truly afford, and cultural, technological and economic changes  have added to the city’s din, creating not one culprit but many.

headline.print_headline: Behind City’s Painful Din, Culprits High and Low
headline.main: Behind City’s Painful Din, Culprits High and Low
